node.text:
Calling all pop culture fans! Hot Toys Summer Showcase has kicked off its first stop at Hong Kong yesterday. Have a closer at some of the highly-accurate life-size statues, figure and collectibles that will create an unforgettable experience. Stay tuned as there’s more to come!

#HotToys #SummerShowcase2021

Hot Toys Summer Showcase 2021 @ Hong Kong
Date: 16th JUL – 15th AUG, 2021
Address: Shop G12-14, Fashion Walk, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
Opening Hours: 12:00pm – 9:00pm

node.text:
With 2020 marking the 20th anniversary of Hot Toys, we are bringing HT20THPlus to Hong Kong as an exceptional location set to showcase our unique craftsmanship with the latest collectibles to figures created from the last two decades. Come join us on this remarkable event!
#HotToys #HT20THPLUS

node.text:
Hot Toys is excited to announce that the Summer Showcase is going virtual! Experience pop culture and fandoms in the unique way, from the comfort of your home, as we are sharing our passions and interests with fans through a mix of masterfully crafted prototypes and highly-detailed figures.

Take a virtual tour of the Summer Showcase now! And hope to meet all of you again soon! 

View in 4K ver.: ht.toys/ss2020

#HotToys #SummerShowcase

node.title: Hot Toys Summer Showcase Virtual Tour

node.text:
Imperial Scout Troopers™ are lightly armored compared to other stormtroopers, which allows them to move more quickly and easily in a range of environments. They are also trained for more independence and adaptability than most Imperial troops. 

Today, Hot Toys is delighted to introduce fans of the Imperial troopers to the new 1/6th scale Scout Trooper collectible figure based on Star Wars: Return of the Jedi™!

The highly-accurate collectible figure is skillfully crafted based on the appearance of the Scout Trooper as seen in the thrilling sequences from Star Wars: Return of the Jedi. It features a newly developed helmet and armor with weathering effects, a finely tailored fabric body suit, a blaster pistol, a blaster rifle, and a themed display stand!

Fans of the original Star Wars trilogy shouldn’t miss out on having this trooper in your collection.

#HotToys #Collectibles #SixthScale #Lucasfilm #StarWars #ReturnoftheJedi #ScoutTrooper #SWEP6

node.text:
Imperial Scout Troopers are lightly armored compared to other stormtroopers, which allows them to move more quickly and easily in a range of environments. On Endor™, Scout Troopers riding speeder-bikes patrolled the forests, guarding against threats to the shield generator protecting the second Death Star™ during its construction in orbit above the moon.

Now Hot Toys is thrilled to expand its popular Star Wars collectibles line up and officially present the exciting 1/6th scale Scout Trooper and Speeder Bike collectible set from Star Wars: Return of the Jedi!

The highly-accurate Scout Trooper collectible figure is skillfully crafted based on the character’s appearance during the thrilling sequences from Star Wars: Return of the Jedi. It features a newly developed helmet and armor with weathering effects, a finely tailored fabric body suit, a blaster pistol, a blaster rifle, and a themed display stand!

The 1/6th scale Speeder Bike is crafted with astonishing craftsmanship showcasing the mechanical details of the vehicle and measures at approximately 50cm in length. It features great paint applications, articulated foot pedals, steering vane, and engine flaps, a cargo bag at the back of the machine, and a themed diorama base! 

This 1/6th scale Scout Trooper and Speeder Bike collectible set will provide a large variety of amazing display options for all Star Wars fans!

#HotToys #Collectibles #SixthScale #Lucasfilm #StarWars #ReturnoftheJedi #ScoutTrooper #SpeederBike #SWEP6

node.text:
In the first Iron Man movie, Tony Stark is repairing the Iron Man Mark III hanging from the ceiling with complex cables and wires connected to the high tech armor while working in his workshop. 

Received numerous positive feedback in its initial release, Hot Toys is excited to reissue the 1/6th scale Mark III (Construction Version) Collectible from the Diorama Series for fans to complete their Iron Man collections.

The highly-accurate collectible is meticulously crafted based on the image of the Iron Man Mark III in the first Iron Man movie. Measure approximately 39cm tall, it features fine sculpture with highly detailed wires, cables, computer board, and chains that connects to the armor; LED light-up functions design on eyes, arc reactor, and forearm; metallic colored painting on the armor; removable armor parts, and specially designed diorama display.
Don’t miss out the opportunity to include this amazing collectible to your workshop diorama!

#Marvel #IronMan

node.text:
【What If...? Cosbaby (S) Bobble Head】

“Space. Time. Reality. It’s more than a linear path.”

Takes inspiration from the comic books of the same title, What If…?, an original series from Marvel Studios will explore moments from the Marvel Cinematic Universe, leading audience into uncharted territory.

To prepare fans for the journey into the multiverse, Hot Toys is bringing characters from this animated series as the latest Cosbaby debuted in Hot Toys Summer Showcase earlier. Features Doctor Strange Supreme with specially applied luminous reflective effect; Party Thor with a rotatable Mjolnir and character backdrop; Zombie Hunter Spidey with magnetic function; Captain Carter, and T'Challa Star-Lord Cosbaby (S) Bobble-Head. Each collectible stands approximately 9.5 – 11.5cm in height with bobble-head function.

Peggy Carter now becomes Captain Carter, wielding a circular shield; Zombie Hunter Spidey wears a cape on top of his classic suit, prepared to shoot some webs; T’Challa Star-Lord captures the galactic explorer in a silver mask and violet jacket; Party Thor is ready to throw a party with his rotatable Mjolnir; Doctor Strange Supreme practices his ability and power in the air, with luminous reflective effect on mystic art effects.

Kick start your What If…? collection with Hot Toys Cosbaby now!

#DisneyPlus #WhatIf #Marvel #HotToys #Cosbaby

node.text:
🦈
“So smart, me!” – King Shark

The squad gathers the most dangerous supervillains in the world is back for new mission! This lowborn son of an ancient shark god, known as Nanaue, was the terror of the Hawaiian seas, before hard time with the Suicide Squad turned him towards a life of maritime crime!

Catching enormous fans’ attention after The Suicide Squad’s official release, Hot Toys is excited to introduce today King Shark as 1/6th scale collectible figure from our Power Pose Series. It’s also one of the figures that made its debut earlier in Hot Toys Summer Showcase!

Masterfully crafted based on the appearance of King Shark in The Suicide Squad, the movie-accurate figure stands approximate 35.5cm tall, features a semi-articulated body structure with the ability to perform arms, wrist and waist movements; detail recreation of King Shark’s signature features such as jaw, rows of sharp teeth, and rough skin texture; terrific paint job using a mixture of white and grey; two pairs of finely sculpted hands for poses; a pair of specially tailored pants with patterns, and a book.

Recruit King Shark to save The Suicide Squad display.

#TheSuicideSquad #KingShark @wbpictures

node.text:
Enjoy a fun filled evening at Hot Toys Summer Night Showcase!

Takes inspiration from our vividly colorful Neon Tech collection series, the after dark Summer Night Showcase transforms the show floor into a glow party that creates an unforgettable experience for fans. The event will also provide a best viewing stage for our eye-catching collectibles with unique glow under specialized light setting, so don’t miss out!

Visit the night showcase to receive a special opportunity to pre-order Joker’s Thug (Neon Color Version) Cosbaby Collectible Set, and to make purchase on Neon Tech Iron Man Cosbaby, CosRider, along with the Glow-in-the-dark Star Wars Cosbaby available only in selected markets. Be sure to pick up the awesome premiums that are exclusive to this event. Check out the photos from Summer Night Showcase now!
 
#HotToys #SummerNightShowcase

.

node.text:
It’s a week away! Marvel Studios’ first animated series, What If…?, is taking fans on an adventure to explore pivotal moments from the Marvel Cinematic Universe and reimagining famous events from the films in unexpected ways. 

Therefore to prepare fans for the upcoming release, Hot Toys is excited to officially introduce Zombie Hunter Spidey as the first 1/6th scale collectible figure from What If…? collection. Meet your favorite characters in the looks you’ve never seen them before! 

Expertly crafted based on the appearance of Zombie Hunter Spidey in the soon-to-be-released animation series, the 1/6th scale figure features a newly crafted masked head sculpt with multiple interchangeable right eye pieces to create different combinations of expressions; a greatly poseable figure body; finely tailored Zombie Hunter Spidey suit following the classic blue and red color scheme with a Cloak of Levitation in burgundy; a number of interchangeable hands for signature poses; assorted web effect accessories, and a dynamic figure stand. 

Kick start your collection on What If…? with the new Zombie Hunter Spidey figure now!

#HotToys #Collectibles #SixthScale #Marvel #MarvelStudios #WhatIf #ZombieHunterSpiderMan

node.text:
“I will shred this universe down to its last atom.” - Thanos

Thanos seeks to save the universe from the same fate as his home planet, by eliminating half of the population. Along with his legion of servants and soldiers, the warlord embarked on a journey to collect the Infinity Stones for his ultimate quest. Based on Avenger: Endgame, Hot Toys is excited to present the final product of Thanos (Battle Damaged Version) 1/6th scale collectible figure highlighting severe damages on armors and the Nano Gauntlet!

Crafted based on the appearance of Thanos in Avengers: Endgame, the figure features a newly developed head sculpt capturing the warlord’s shocked facial expression, an interchangeable angry head sculpt, a specially designed muscular body exhibiting hyper realistic skin texture and tendons, a damaged 1/6th scale Nano Gauntlet with LED light up function and a matching hand mounted with all six Infinity Stones, an extra interchangeable hand for Nano Gauntlet features finger snapping gesture, astounding degree of battle damage details being reflected on Thanos’ shiny golden armor and accessories including a newly crafted helmet, a heavy double-edged sword, as well as a battlefield inspired diorama figure base.

Revisit the galactic showdown with the Battle Damaged Version of Thanos!

#HotToys #Collectibles #SixthScale #Marvel #MarvelStudios #Avengers #Endgame #Thanos #BattleDamaged

node.text:
The debut of Marvel Studios’ WandaVision about the famous newlyweds has made a strong impression on fans and audience. Inspired by the remarkable scene from the series finale, Hot Toys is excited to introduce a new Cosbaby featuring The Scarlet Witch with Darkhold. Measure approximately 10cm tall with bobble-head function and luminous reflective effect. Available only in selected markets.

The stylish Cosbaby recreates Scarlet Witch wearing her iconic scarlet red costume and tiara, holding the Darkhold book, practicing chaos magic! Includes luminous reflective effect on eyes, hands, and power effects; and a specially designed metallic card. 

In addition, fans purchase The Scartlet Witch with Darkhold Cosbaby at Hot Toys Summer Showcase will get a certificate serial number imprinted on the card exclusively. 

Change your reality and your collection with this Cosbaby now!

#HotToys #Collectibles #Cosbaby #Marvel #MarvelStudios #WandaVision #TheScarletWitch #Darkhold

More highly accurate figures capturing characters from the far far away galaxy will amaze fans with its true likeness, including the Young Luke Skywalker from Star Wars: The Mandalorian, and Crosshair from Star Wars: The Bad Batch. node.text:
【Star Wars: The Mandalorian - 1/6th scale Luke Skywalker Collectible Figure】

“A Jedi?”

Luke Skywalker™ was a Tatooine™ farmboy who rose from humble beginnings to become one of the greatest Jedi the galaxy has ever known. Star Wars fans around the world were extremely thrilled to see his surprise appearance on Moff Gideon™’s ship and take down platoons of Dark Troopers™ to find Grogu™.

Today, Hot Toys is excited to present the highly anticipated brand new 1/6th scale Luke Skywalker collectible figure from The Mandalorian as part of our premium DX series for all Star Wars fans!

The highly-accurate Luke Skywalker collectible figure features a meticulously developed new head sculpt with astonishing likeness, skillfully tailored Jedi outfit and cloak, a lightsaber with LED light-up function, a display base and themed backdrop!

Furthermore, Grogu™ with articulated head and arms is specially featured along with Luke! 

A Special Edition available only in select markets will specially include hologram figure of Moff Gideon’s light cruiser and holoprojector as bonus accessories.

Do not miss out on the opportunity to have this incredible Luke Skywalker collectible figure in your collection!

#HotToys #Collectibles #SixthScale #Lucasfilm #StarWars #TheMandalorian #LukeSkywalker #Grogu
